programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Muriels nephew, Fred, a deranged barber, comes to the farm for a visit. Fred and Courage get locked in the bathroom, much to Courages distress.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kitesurf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the shebear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admiration. He decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings kite.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: A storm with great gusts of wind has been blowing all night. Then someone tapping on a tree trunk stops Mumfie, Jelly Bean and Pinkey from going to sleep. In the morning they discover that the tapping came from a woodpecker who was calling his mate.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: Something strange is happening on the ice shelf. It is impossible to enter the hotel without sneezing loudly. The penguins are sitting on their eggs at the moment and a solution must be found quickly so they are not disturbed.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Sylvester believes a commercial that says eating Chewy Chomps will make him cool.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: Dolores is frantic when she cant charge any of her phones, tablets or computers and they run out of power. The Power Rockers and Jay teach Dolores to enjoy life without technology.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong societys differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15yearold Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling theyve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.desc: With more and more people living in cities, how can we improve life in urban areas, ensure food security and ease the burden on the environment? From community and rooftop farms, to cave dwellings and clean air projects in India, Bangladesh and Spain.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: For centuries, refrigeration tech has stayed the same energyhungry and reliant on harmful gases. Enter magnetocaloric cooling a new solution claiming to be 30 more energyefficient than current cooling systems. And its scalable. From fridges to cooling buildings and server farms.

programme.desc: Tawanna and Anthony have been dating for two years, and are considering moving in together. Anthony works in real estate sales around the Atlanta area and would like to expand his business domestically.

programme.title: Cub Camp 1
programme.desc: Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual prehibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bearfriendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing landdwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: Weve got big hits and theyre even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: Rap & R&B Collabs!
programme.desc: Music has a great way of bringing people and genres together to form pure art! Here are some of our essential collaborations in Rap & R&B which just make sense!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A drug approved in Japan in 2018 involves just one injection for lumbar disc hernias, helping many patients for whom surgery was the only way to control the pain. We look at how it works.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Muhammad Nurul Elahi in Niigata who grows lotus roots to fund an elementary school he opened in his native Bangladesh, and Moroccan Mohamed Aalla who trains at a soy sauce maker in Kagawa.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on senpai in Japan.

programme.title: Tokyos Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40 of Tokyos Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLDJAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of NHK NEWSLINE and the launch of NHK NEWS 7. We also feature Japan in Focus moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Babys communication skills are put to the test. When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, its up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Everyones excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but its getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that hes not a monster.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: When Chef runs out of secret sauce, he must venture to the Stumps secret recipe vault. Chef is ready to plant some seedlings, but the gardens soil is hard as a rock. He seeks help from some neighbor worms, but they arent so easy to befriend.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: No! Its over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, hes a big boy now! The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbidous beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night. Barbapapa decides to tell the barbababies about the time he went to explore the Arctic and the seabed.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. Paddington accepts an inventors award for Simi when shes too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ make friends with a space alien named Gormy! But when Gormys jetpack loses power, they set out to help him find six special space batteries so he can fly home to his alien family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The postmans truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Adelaide and Carl battle it out to win Jr. Zookeeper badges but their fighting might ruin both of their chances. Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back no matter what!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Mr. Changs job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBobs diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the boxand off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.desc: Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they borrow money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive exgirlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amys Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. programme.title: QUAND LAFRIQUE SAUVA LA FRANCE
programme.desc: 1940. When de Gaulle called on the French to join him he hardly imagined that he would be leading the struggle to liberate France from the heart of black Africa. Brazzaville became the capital of Free France. In these mobilised colonies, an immense desire for independence was coming to life.
